get.summary: Get a List of Job Configs

parameters.name: onlyfavs
parameters.description: Show all or only favorite Job Configs

post.summary: Create a new Job Config from a djar package
post.description: Upload a djar package, set an entrypoint by providing rtc or entrypoint to the job config. If no rtc or entrypoint is provided, an entrypoint is set by default.

parameters.name: entrypoint
parameters.description: The entrypoint file in the package

post.summary: Sets the job config as a user favorite.

delete.summary: Unsets the job config as a user favorite

get.summary: List the Files on the Job Config

post.summary: Create a new File on the Job Config
post.description: Request body contents will be saved to the file contents.

get.summary: Retrieve the Entry Points defined inside ANY package attached to a Job Config

put.description: Request body contents will be saved to the file contents.

post.summary: Import distinct Macros from MacroDef file to Job Config
post.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure. Secure macros can only be updated if update is secure.

get.summary: List the Macros on the Job Config
get.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure.

post.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure. Secure macros can only be updated if update is secure.

get.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure.

put.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure. Secure macros can only be updated if update is secure.

put.summary: Assigns new owner to the Config

get.summary: Retrieve the Entry Points defined inside the SELECTED package on a Job Config

head.summary: Retrieve the Entry Points defined inside the SELECTED package on a Job Config

post.summary: Create a subscription to a job config

get.summary: Get a list of Job Templates

parameters.name: onlyfavs
parameters.description: Show all or only favorite Job Templates

post.summary: Create a new Job Template from a djar package
post.description: Upload a djar package, set an entrypoint by providing rtc or entrypoint to the job template. If no rtc or entrypoint is provided, an entrypoint is set by default.

parameters.name: entrypoint
parameters.description: The entrypoint file in the package

post.summary: Sets the job template as a user favorite.

delete.summary: Unsets the job template as a user favorite

get.summary: Get a List of Job Template Files

post.summary: Create a new Job Template File
post.description: Request body contents will be saved to the file contents.

get.summary: Retrieve the Entry Points defined inside ANY package attached to a Job Template

put.description: Request body contents will be saved to the file contents.

get.summary: List the Job Configs on the Job Template

post.summary: Create a Job Config on a Job Template
Create a new Job Config from a djar package
post.description: Upload a djar package, set an entrypoint by providing rtc or entrypoint to the job config. If no rtc or entrypoint is provided, an entrypoint is set by default.

parameters.name: entrypoint
parameters.description: The entrypoint file in the package

post.summary: Import distinct Macros from MacroDef file to Job Template
post.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure.

get.summary: List the Macros on the Job Template
get.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure.

post.summary: Create a Macro on the Job Template
post.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure.

get.summary: Get a Macro from the Job Template
get.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure.

put.summary: Update a Macro on the Job Template
put.description: Macro value is only returned if the macro is not marked as secure. Secure macros can only be updated if update is secure.

delete.summary: Delete a Macro on a Job Template

put.summary: Assigns new owner to the Template
